transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello sir.
Executive: Haan boliye.
Customer: Haan sir abhi just maine try kiya hai na toh video meeting like hum kar sakte hain. Main just abhi try kar rahi thi aapke liye aur main ek aur cheez mujhe ek query tha sir aapke saath ki aapka PNS number like dial kiya hai maine toh aap zero vagera aage laga nahi kiya nahi?
Executive: Nahi.
Customer: Sir zero laga denge phir dial karna hota hai. Ek baar aap kar lo ek minute mein then hum uske baad video meeting par bhi connect karte hain. Main aapko services vagera guide karna chahti hoon services vagera ke.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Okay aur ek bari sir please karega like baar baar karungi na same to same toh aapko woh number block ho jaate hain isliye keh rahi hoon. Okay ek baar aap kar lo then hum dekhte hain aajao video meeting karein.
Customer: Aur aapke aapka jo registered number hai usse nahi karega sir.
Executive: Nahi usse toh mujhe malum nahi hoga.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Ho raha hai na aapko?
Executive: Haan zero laga kar toh ja raha hai.
Customer: Haan sir sir zero laga kar ke karte hain. Okay yeh wala query please.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
(silence)
Customer: Aap jis vyakti se baat kar rahe hain unhone aapke call ko hold par rakha hai. Kripya line par bane rahe. The person you are speaking with has...
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to connect via video meeting.

- Query regarding dialing PNS number with zero.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to dial the number with zero.

- Executive was asked to dial only once.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, pns number, dialing, zero
